overview: A socio-realist drama-comedy Ô¨Ålm, it follows a seemingly usual day in the life of Loida Malabanan as she embarks on yet another shooting day of a soap opera as an extra. As the shoot goes on, we get a glimpse of the truth in the ruling system of the production as well as the exploitation of the marginalized laborers like her.
tagline: There are no small roles. Only bit players.
title: Ekstra
